item.title: Dotfiles
item.description: My dotfiles repository, which is more of a continuous project likely to never be done, for managing all my config files for vim, zsh, tmux, git, other dotfiles and utilities I use. Requirements the default profile contains polybar configs, however these won’t be useful until it is installed, can build it from sources or check if the os repo has it. Therefore if you do not want polybar no need to install it.
